loot_rewards.description: The loot you are given on pick-up.

delete_after_pickup.description: [bool]If set, deletes the entity after being picked-up.

visiblity_mask.description: [string]If set, this visibility mask is hidden on entity when picked up

on_destroyed.description: The toggles for physics and visibilty to apply on destroyed.

on_destroyed_sample.description: [adhd]The unit to spawn in the players hand when picking up this sample

sample_pickup_unit.description: [unit]The unit to spawn in the players hand when picking up this sample

pickup_ability.description: Ability to play on this unit when it's picked up but not deleted.

disable_ability.description: Ability to play on this unit for hotjoining players to disable the effects if this loot has already been picked up

destroyed_ability.description: Ability to play on this unit when sample is destroyed

spawn_ability_with_loot.description: Ability to play on this unit on spawn if there is still loot

area_of_interest_min_radius.description: Note: only used for intel. If the area of interest is shown, specify the minimum radius of the circle to be shown using a larger radius means that the players will potentially have to search a wider area.
